description:
When it comes to winning personal injury cases in Springfield, experience and integrity matter. At The Attkisson Law Firm, LLC, our team of Ohio lawyers brings both of these traits to the table to help you secure damages for your case. We genuinely care about helping our clients. Beyond even the legal aspect of the cases we handle, we want to help our patients make full recoveries and reclaim their lives.

How we can help

When recovering from injuries, the last thing you want is to fight with the insurance company. To make matters worse, the insurance company generally has a team of professionals ready to fight on its behalf, while it focuses on fattening its purses.

When you choose The Attkisson Law Firm, LLC, as your advocate, you can leave the work up to us. We accept phone calls 24/7, so you can get the answers you need to any pressing questions you might have. You can also count on our team to keep you updated with regular reports.

Cases we handle

The Attkisson Law Firm, LLC, tackles a wide range of cases that fall under the personal injury header. These include the following:

  • Wrongful death
  • Truck accidents
  • Dog bites
  • Car accidents
  • Truck accidents
  • Slips and falls
Our award-winning team will stop at nothing to get you the results you deserve. The first consultation is free.
